title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, padded satin, stem, eyelet, feather over withdrawn element work, four-sided (square), cross, and whipped running stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Initials, bands of pattern at upper right and five wise maidens at lower left.  Five wise maidens (Matthew 25.1) with their lamps.
name: Sampler
